definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Used for lying-in women and women who are suffering catamenia blood.
sentences.chinese: 同時可用於產婦和經血較多的婦女。

sentences.english: The blood culture showed vibrio vulnificus growth.
sentences.chinese: 經血液培養是海洋創傷弧菌感染。

sentences.english: The cutter leaves a tiny opening to permit urination and menstruation.
sentences.chinese: 割禮師會留下一個小開口用來排尿和經血。

sentences.english: A few of cases may be due to hematogenous metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 少數病例也可經血行轉移至前尿道。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the ultrasound feature of rudimentary uterus and the retention of menstruation in uterus cavity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討殘角子宮並宮腔經血瀦留的超聲特徵。

sentences.english: Glucose was controlled preferably in 9 cases of diabetes after the treatment of BLC.
sentences.chinese: 伴有糖尿病的9例經血脂清洗治療後血糖也得到控制。

sentences.english: This kind of traditional Chinese medicine is very effective in treating menstrual disorders.
sentences.chinese: 這種中藥對治療女性經血不調很有效。

sentences.english: There was no proof that CJD could be transmitted through blood products.
sentences.chinese: 沒有證據顯示瘋牛症可經血製品傳染。

sentences.english: Von Willebrand's Disease is a condition which leads to heavy or prolonged menstrual flow.
sentences.chinese: 溫韋伯氏病是一種引起大量經血或經期拉長的疾病。

sentences.english: The identification of menstrual blood belongs to the forensic examination of bloodstains.
sentences.chinese: 月經血鑑定是法醫血痕檢驗的內容之一。

sentences.english: She was bleeding, but it was only woman's blood.
sentences.chinese: 她現在流的血不過是經血罷了。

definition: (of water) to rise/rising tide/(of women) to get one's period
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
